channel.title: Landings on Andreas Offenhaeuser
channel.description: Recent content in Landings on Andreas Offenhaeuser

item.title: About me
item.description: In 2020 I joined Bosch Japan in Yokohama as Digitalization Program Lead for Engineering, or as my boss called it: The Digitalization Dragon Slayer. On the one hand I am leading the overall digitalization efforts in a consulting fashion on the other hand I am actively developing solutions for the area of Systems and Software engineering. My special focus is on automating previously manual tasks and creating data awareness. My guiding principles for this job being: It is not a humans job to replicate data from one system to another

item.title: Resume
item.description: For a more complete picture of my experiences feel free to take a look at my curriculum vitae. It is not dated but git versioned with a little green number in the top right. Download(Print version)
